title: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration Free Download
description:
Get Rise of the Tomb Raider for free instantly and play pre-installed complete game on SteamRiP
Rise of the Tomb Raider is an action-adventure game that continues the series about Tomb Raider Lara Croft. This time, together with the main character you will have to go to Siberia, where you will find survival, battles, hunting and much more According to the plot, the main character this time goes to Siberia, where, according to rumors, there is a very powerful artifact that can give immortality and eternal youth.
But Lara is not the only hunter for this artifact. He is also hunted by mercenaries from the Trinity organization, well-armed, trained in survival fighters. The gameplay of the game is based primarily on survival in very difficult conditions. You will have to hunt wild animals, survive in the eerie cold, fight against the mercenaries of a secret organization, solve physics puzzles, make your way to guarded objects, and much more.

system_requirements.OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (Windows 8 is not officially supported)
system_requirements.Graphics: Card made within the last 4 years (Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0)
